VRDisplaySubmitFrame.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The submitFrame() method of the interface captures the current state of the currently being presented and displays it on the VRDisplay.

blockquote.para: Note: This method was part of the old WebVR API. It has been superseded by the WebXR Device API.

remarks.para: The frame should subsequently be rendered using the and matrices provided by the last call to .
